item.description:
I HAVE ONE TICKET AVAILABLE IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO JOIN US.

PLEASE LET ME KNOW AS SOON AS POSSIBLE.

THANKS/ ELLEN


Come join the summer celebrations at your local IKEA store!
All you can eat Crayfish buffet for $9.99 on Friday, August 17, 2012. kraftskiva is an important celebration in Sweden and is usually held in August at the height of the crayfish season. Let's make a party of it and have fun eating crayfish (I never have, have you?) Once I have some numbers of people, I will make a reservation for us.

I MUST GET THE TICKETS TOMORROW OR SATURDAY AT THE LATEST. THIS IS SELLING OUT FAST. PLEASE EMAIL ME IMMEDIATELY.Â  duckstoyou@aol.com
item.name: Summer Crayfish Celebration at Ikea
